Posts.Content: Jul 13, 2012 05:09AM kkhalle wrote: I had a Bilateral mastectomy and did not have my reconstructive surgery until 18 months later.  I am a swimmer and I swam flat.  Did not have any issues.   After my reconstructive surgery I am back swimming.  Try not to worrie about it.  I find most poeple didn't even notice.
